files.patch: @@ -41,5 +41,6 @@ - * integer {@linkplain scale() scale}. If zero or positive, - * the scale is the number of digits to the right of the decimal - * point. The value of the - * number represented by the {@code BigDecimal} is therefore + * integer {@linkplain scale() scale}.
